wikipedia_page.main: Frank Lipscomb (13 March 1863 – 25 September 1951) was an English amateur cricketer. He played 18 first-class matches, mainly for Kent County Cricket Club, between 1882 and 1884.

response: Lipscomb married Lucy Richmond in 1859; the couple had five children. One of their sons, Frank Lipscomb, played first-class cricket, mainly as a fast bowler for Kent in the 1880s before emigrating to Australia.Carlaw, op. cit., pp.332–334.
